name: DISC EXHIBITION
description:
DISC EXHIBITION is a made about a cyber museum  full with rooms and discs. Try to get the highscores and unlock all of the rooms, and don't worry about dying - it's all virtual!

Made for the Disc Room Game Jam.

Thank you for the DISC ROOM team for making the game and doing this jam, and especially Doseone for providing a sound pack!

> CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys to move / start the game
  • Enter to enter rooms / restart rooms
  • Esc to exit rooms / game
